title: Dele
overview: Freelance programmer Keiji Sakagami is paralysed in the lower half of his body because of an unknown illness and confined to a wheelchair. He sets up a company called dele. LIFE in partnership with the law firm established by his late father. At the request of clients, Sakagami works together with the freelance jack-of-all-trades Yutaro Mashiba to delete all unfavorable digital records left in their computers and smartphonesafter they die.
